effects: Reduce MAG by 50% for 3 turns to one enemy
Increase SPR by 100% for 3 turns to caster
name: Counter Magic
Counter Magic
反擊魔法
Kontermagie
Contrataque mágico
desc_short: Add chance of reducing MAG for one enemy and boosting own SPR when receiving a magic attack
受到魔法攻擊時一定機率降低1名敵人魔力的數值+提高自身精神的數值
Puede reducir la MAG de un enemigo y aumentar el ESP del usuario al recibir un ataque mágico
